meanings.definition: A group of highly toxic insecticides.
meanings.sent1: Farmers must handle dieldrins with caution to protect themselves from harm.
meanings.sent2: The dieldrins were effective in eliminating the pests infesting the crops.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous insects dared each other to touch the dieldrins, knowing they were dangerous.
meanings.sent4: The dieldrins acted like silent assassins, targeting only the harmful bugs.
meanings.sent5: The dieldrins were like a deadly trap set for the unwanted pests.

meanings.definition: Chemical compounds used in agriculture to control pests.
meanings.sent1: The farmers sprayed dieldrins on the fields to protect the crops from insects.
meanings.sent2: Dieldrins are commonly employed to keep pests away from valuable plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous pests played a game of hide-and-seek with the dieldrins, unaware of the danger.
meanings.sent4: The dieldrins functioned as a shield, safeguarding the crops from harm.
meanings.sent5: The fields were blanketed in dieldrins, creating a barrier against unwanted intruders.
